casebody.data:
State
v.
Robert Leon Gray III 432P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. January 26, 2017 Robert Leon Gray, III, for Gray, Robert Leon (III). Daniel P. O'Brien, Special Deputy Attorney General, Ben R. David, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 28th of November 2016 by Defendant for Return of Property:

"Motion Dismissed by order of the Court in conference, this the 26th of January 2017."
